    Specifies standard methods of alpha blending.
    BufferUsage
    Provides a set of hints used when allocating Vertex Buffer Objects to tell the system how often the data will be updated.
    GeomFunc
    Represents a set number of supported OpenGL geometry drawing functions.
    GL2Handle 
    GL3Handle 
    GLConfig
    OpenGL Graphics Library Config - specifies configuration options for the Snap2D OpenGL rendering engine (powered by JOGL 2.0).
    GLConfig.Property
    Properties used by Java2D (configurable at start or by System.setProperty).
    GLDisplay.GLDisposalCallback 
    GLFeature
    Mappings to selected OpenGL features that may be enabled/disabled by the caller.
    GLHandle
    Main handle object for manipulating GL data and graphics.
    GLProgram
    Class representing a GLSL program object.

    Rendering interface for the Snap2D OpenGL pipeline.

    Loop where render/update logic is executed.
